page_content:
Notification Groups

Version:MissionOS_2.0

This Feature shows the capability of the MissionOS application to send notifications to a group of users based on various criteria like Publish Fail, Calculate Fail, Filter Fail, Load Fail, Alarm Fail, Quarantined, Record Rejection, Puller Errors, Binder Errors and Overdue. Notifications are categorized under three tabs based on the said criteria - DUI, Loader Notifications and Instrument Overdue.

To access this feature, first log into the application and open the Data Manager.

In Data Manager, navigate to Admin > Setup > Notification Groups.

 

 

Follow the steps below to add a notification group:

  1. Type a new Notification Group Name.
  2. Enter the Group Description.
  3. Select the users to be included in the group from the Select Users (One or more users can be grouped under a particular notification group. However, notification groups are unique in the sense that no user can be assigned to more than one group.)
  4. Select the notifications types from DUI – Select All or the essential options. DUI refer to ‘Data Under Investigation’. Once this option is selected for available choices, corresponding users are notified about Publish Fail, Calculate Fail, Filter Fail, Load Fail, Alarm Fail, Quarantined and Record Rejection.
  5. You can set the media as e-mail or SMS or both to send the notifications.
  6. Select the notification types – Binder and Puller Errors from Loader Notification.
  7. Finally select notification type - Overdue from Instrument Overdue.
    You can make selections of notification types based on the needs of the group you create.
  8. Click Add Notification Group.

 

The table below describes the options under DUI selecting which the users are notified:

Different Types of Reason Codes Description
Publish Fail Does not meet final publication criteria
Calculate Fail System is unable to calculate due to no data found in the calculation fields
Filter Fail Reading is breaching the filter limits
Load Fail System is unable to recognize daily data file if the instrument is not found in the system
Alarm Fail Record has triggered an alert/alarm review event and has a review pending
Quarantined The record has been put under investigation manually using the quarantine function for further investigation or review
Record Rejected Data record in DUI taken out of investigation and rejected

 

 

 

 

DUI Notification:

Refer to the figure below to see how the DUI notification appears with different instrument status.

 

 

Loader Notification:

This is enabled for Puller and Binder errors for Data Manager dashboard.

Instrument Overdue:

This is the notification that is received when an instrument exceeds the review levels for elapsed time between readings. The Overdue section of AAA Data tab is populated as per the breach.
